channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Whole Foods to install smart food waste bins from Mill starting in 2027
item.description: The food waste startup founded by Nest alumnus Matt Rogers also received an investment from Amazon's Climate Pledge Fund.

item.title: Amazon says Russian hackers behind major cyber campaign to target Western energy sector
item.description: For years, the GRU was snooping in critical infrastructure firms by abusing misconfigurations and zero-days, Amazon says.

item.title: Baldur's Gate 3 director says the game's cinematics and how choices were portrayed is one of the 'biggest lessons' Larian is bringing to Divinity — 'I think that was probably my biggest takeaway from everything'
item.description: Larian Studios founder and Baldur's Gate 3 director, Swen Vincke, has said Divinity will feature cinematics unlike previous iterations in the series.

item.title: New Head of Trump's Cancer Panel Questioned Links Between Vaccines and Cancer
item.description: Yale epidemiologist Harvey Risch, who has speculated about a connection between Covid vaccines and “turbo cancer” and promoted ivermectin, says he'll chair the President's Cancer Panel.

item.title: Netflix doubles down on video podcasts with iHeartMedia deal
item.description: Netflix's has its second big foray into video podcasts with its new partnership with iHeartMedia.

item.title: C’est officiel : l’Europe capitule et enterre le 100 % électrique pour 2035
item.description: Le couperet est tombé, mais il est moins tranchant que prévu. Après des jours de tensions intenses, Bruxelles a cédé face à la réalité industrielle : l'obligation du tout-électrique est levée, offrant un sursis inespéré aux moteurs hybrides.

item.title: Cloudflare report reveals global internet internet traffic grew 19% in 2025 - but a lot of it was just bots
item.description: ‘Volatile crawling activity’ is an ongoing struggle for internet sites, but website owners are fighting back.

item.title: Disclosure Day’s first trailer teases close encounters of a different kind
item.description: The first trailer for Steven Spielberg's upcoming film Disclosure Day is here, and it will leave you with more questions than answers about what exactly is going on. There is no denying that something strange is happening to a Kansas City newscaster (Emily Blunt) who goes into a strange trance on-air in Disclosure Day's new […]

item.title: Renault Twingo électrique : quelle est cette option indispensable à choisir et pourtant peu connue du grand public
item.description: Renault a officialisé les tarifs de sa Twingo E-Tech, confirmant que la petite voiture électrique débutait sous les 20 000 euros hors bonus écologique… et que la charge rapide n'est pas de série. Voilà pourquoi ne pas cocher cette option serait une erreur.

item.title: Go Shopping With the Mighty Nein in This Magical Clip (Exclusive)
item.description: Get a look at what's coming in this week's 'Mighty Nein' episode 'Belonging,' and the animated debut of a beloved character.

item.title: How to watch Fallout season 2 online from anywhere
item.description: Lucy (Ella Purnell) and the Ghoul (Walton Goggins) explore Mojave and the delightful local factions. Here's how to watch Fallout season 2 from anywhere.

item.title: The Housemaid review: this violent pantomime turns the book into a grotesque nightmare
item.description: If you like your movies far-fetched, foolish and completely frivolous, look no further than The Housemaid. But good, it is not.

item.title: China lowers anti-dumping tariffs on pork imports from the EU
item.description: The final tariff rates of 4.9%–19.8% are due to take effect beginning Wednesday and last for five years. China will impose tariffs of up to 19.8% on pork imports from the European Union, a drastic drop from preliminary tariffs of up to 62.4%, its Commerce Ministry said Tuesday.

item.title: Voici la meilleure caméra 360 degrés de l’année – Frandroid Awards 2025
item.description: Dans un marché des caméras à 360 degrés, Insta360 conserve son avance avec sa Insta360 X5 particulièrement aboutie et simple d'utilisation, malgré les percées de GoPro et, surtout, de DJI.

item.title: L’Europe veut autoriser la vente des voitures thermiques neuves en 2035 : voici les moteurs qui seraient sauvés
item.description: La Commission européenne vient de présenter son projet pour permettre de continuer à vendre des voitures thermiques après 2035. La liste des moteurs concernés est finalement assez longue. Mais attention, tout n'est pas rose pour les conducteurs, et surtout, tout est encore en suspens.

item.title: Les Tesla Model Y vont enfin bénéficier des batteries « maison » en Europe : pourquoi tout n’est pas rose pour autant
item.description: Après une interruption pour modernisation, l'usine allemande de Tesla recommence à assembler des batteries. Mais les promesses initiales d'Elon Musk d'y construire la plus grande usine de batteries au monde semblent définitivement enterrées. Et l'avenir du site se joue désormais sur fond de tension sociale, le patron conditionnant les investissements futurs au résultat des élections syndicales de mars prochain. ...

item.title: UK MPs target VPNs in latest Online Safety Act debate
item.description: The debate around age verification and VPNs heats up as MPs confirm their commitment to review the role these providers should have in preventing their service from being misused to evade the law.

item.title: Dans quelles situations changer le sens d’un câble USB-C peut être utile ?
item.description: L'une des grandes innovations du connecteur USB-C, c'est sa symétrie : vous pouvez le brancher dans n'importe quel sens pour qu'il fonctionne. Mais parfois, il peut quand même être nécessaire de tester un autre sens.

item.title: Science says super-achievers don’t set avoidance goals. Here’s why successful people set approach goals
item.description: Research shows the words you use to describe a goal can make a dramatic difference in success or failure. We all have goals, but at least some of the difference in achieving those goals comes down to how you frame them.

item.title: AirPods Might Get a Big Dose of AI
item.description: A leaked iPhone prototype is giving some insight into future feature AirPods features.

item.title: Le Google Pixel 10 est une superbe affaire de Noël dans ce pack à -33 % chez Fnac et Darty
item.description: Envie d’un beau cadeau Tech à glisser sous le sapin ? Fnac et Darty proposent un pack qui réunit le récent Google Pixel 10 et les Buds 2a, le tout à 699 euros au lieu de 1 048 euros. Les deux font la paire puisque vous pourrez profiter du savoir-faire de la firme Mountain View à un prix plus doux.

item.title: An iconic joystick from the Commodore 64 era is returning
item.description: Retro Games, a company known for its upgraded revivals of iconic '80s and '90s era computers, including the Commodore 64 and Amiga, has announced that it's bringing back another accessory from the same era. If you grew up gaming before the NES hit the US, you were probably using (or drooling over) the Quickshot II. […]

item.title: What happened to iRobot can happen to anyone
item.description: The company which popularized robot vacuum cleaners around the world has filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy. iRobot, makers of the Roomba, has been synonymous with the category since its inception, but its star had dulled in recent years. The company plans to sell its assets to its primary supplier, China’s Picea Robotics, in the hope of maintaining its business.Everyone’s got a strident opinion as to why iRobot fell from grace. The rugged individualists blame limp regulators on both sides of the pond (and their hatred for big tech) for blocking Amazon’s attempted purchase in 2023. Those on the h...

item.title: La sélection des meilleurs smartphones à grand écran en 2025
item.description: D'année en année, les smartphones ne cessent de grandir. Vous êtes adeptes des grands écrans ? Que ce soit pour jouer, regarder des vidéos ou juste pour un plus grand confort, nous avons sélectionné pour vous les meilleurs téléphones avec un grand écran -- au minimum 6,7 pouces.

item.title: Some of the best Epson projectors are up to $1,000 off at Best Buy today
item.description: Thinking about getting a projector? Best Buy has huge last-minute price cuts on models that we've reviewed (and loved) here at TechRadar.

item.title: The Worst Thing About the RAM Shortage That Nobody’s Talking About
item.description: No matter what, consumers are going to lose.

item.title: You can still get a discounted PS5 Pro right now — and it'll arrive before Christmas
item.description: This PS5 Pro deal takes the premium console down to its lowest price in months.

item.title: End-of-year clearance sale on OLED TVs — record-low prices from Samsung, Sony and LG
item.description: Retailers are offering significant price cuts on this year's best-selling OLED TVs, and I'm rounding up today's best deals from Samsung, Sony, and LG.

item.title: Too many doorbell or camera notifications? Ring is using AI to condense alerts so you're not bombarded
item.description: Ring has launched AI Single Event Alert, which combines related notifications to cut down noise.

item.title: How to watch The Ashes 2025-26 Test 3 for *FREE* — Stream on 7Plus
item.description: Here's our guide on how to watch The Ashes 2025-26 Test 3 for free on 7Plus from anywhere in the world.

item.title: iPhone 17 Pro : boutons « mous » ou « collants », la mauvaise surprise qui agace de plus en plus d’utilisateurs
item.description: De plus en plus d'utilisateurs signalent une sensation étrange au niveau des boutons de leur iPhone 17 Pro et Pro Max. Entre clics absents, sensation de flottement et refus de prise en charge en Apple Store, ce défaut de jeunesse commence à faire du bruit

item.title: One of the Most Complete Human Ancestors Ever Found Isn’t Who We Thought It Was
item.description: New research challenges the previous identification of a famous fossil dubbed "Little Foot."

item.title: Microsoft’s latest desperate attempt to stop people using Edge to download Google Chrome focuses on internet safety
item.description: Microsoft is getting desperate in its attempts to stop people using Google Chrome instead of Edge – but it risks annoying even more people.

item.title: Everything is gambling now
item.description: Here's a list of things you can bet on, right this second. This year's Super Bowl winner, sure. The winner of Survivor season 49, okay. But the number of gifts Santa will deliver this year? The number of tweets Elon Musk will send in the next 7 days? How much money Avatar: Fire and Ash […]

item.title: This Google Chrome extension has been silently stealing every AI prompt its users enter
item.description: Malicious Chrome extension has also been stealing AI responses and sharing the data with other companies.

item.title: Dead Island 3 is in development and will reportedly come out in 2028
item.description:
The zombie-decapitating sim Dead Island 3 is still being developed, according to financial documents from Dambuster Studios that were published on X and reported on by Video Games Chronicle. These documents suggest a 2028 release date, so that's something to look forward to. Dambuster Studios' financial statements are out (as of March 2025)The company employed 194 employeesDead Island 3 is in developmentThe current predicted release window for the project is Q1/2 2028 pic.twitter.com/FOHOitH3nD— Timur222 (@bogorad222) December 16, 2025
The paperwork says the development is "moving at pace" an...

item.title: La fin du “Made in Germany” ? Pourquoi Mercedes a mis un moteur essence chinois dans sa nouvelle CLA hybride
item.description: L'industrie automobile traverse une mutation profonde, et les nouvelles Mercedes CLA et GLB en deviennent l'un des symboles les plus marquants. Pour la première fois, le moteur essence (hybride) d'une Mercedes-Benz vendu en Europe n'est plus assemblé en Allemagne, mais en Chine.

item.title: Ces PC gamer RTX 50 avec 32 Go de RAM sont en promotion (mais ça ne va pas durer) [Sponso]
item.description: Et si c’était le bon moment pour acheter un PC ? C’est ce que semble penser Materiel.net avec son catalogue rempli de machines dédiées à tous les usages. Jeu, création ou IA, il y a forcément une tour faite pour vous.

item.title: A nasty ‘superflu’ virus is spreading in the U.S. right now: What to know about the subclade K flu variant
item.description: The variant is part of the H3N2 strain, but it’s distinct enough to make it materially different. It comes as peak influenza season is getting underway. For many people, the winter holiday period is their favorite time of the year. It’s weeks full of family, friends, gifts, and cozy indoor get-togethers.

item.title: Canadian peer-to-peer clothing rental company Rax is expanding to the U.S.
item.description: Rax is a peer-to-peer clothing rental company that won top consumer pitch at Disrupt this year.

item.title: Why Trump just launched a $10 billion defamation lawsuit against the BBC
item.description: President Trump’s 33-page lawsuit accuses the BBC of deceptive editing of his speech on January 6, 2021. President Donald Trump filed a lawsuit Monday seeking $10 billion in damages from the BBC, accusing the British broadcaster of defamation as well as deceptive and unfair trade practices.The 33-page lawsuit accuses the BBC of broadcasting a “false, defamatory, deceptive, disparaging, inflammatory, and malicious depiction of President Trump,” calling it “a brazen attempt to interfere in and influence” the 2024 U.S. presidential election.It accused the BBC of “splicing together two entirely se...

item.title: #FrandroidOffreMoi un aspirateur robot Xiaomi trop pratique
item.description: Le calendrier de l’Avent #FrandroidOffreMoi reste sur sa belle lancée ! Aujourd'hui, pour la 16e case, on s'attaque à la corvée de ménage avec un allié de taille pour garder votre intérieur impeccable sans lever le petit doigt. J'ai nommé le Xiaomi Robot Vacuum S20+.

item.title: Une sonde de la Nasa vient de cartographier pour la première fois la frontière du Soleil que l’on n’avait jamais vu
item.description: Les étoiles sont des objets gouvernés par une physique que les astronomes ne comprennent pas encore tout à fait. Le Soleil ne fait pas exception. Mais désormais, les chercheurs pourront compter sur une carte inédite pour se faire une idée plus précise de ce qui se passe réellement autour de...

item.title: The First Trailer for Steven Spielberg’s Mystery UFO Movie Is Finally Here
item.description: 'Disclosure Day' stars Emily Blunt, Josh O'Connor, and Colin Firth as they prepare the world for the truth that's out there.

item.title: The best board games to gift and play with the family for the 2025 holiday season
item.description:
Once upon a time, a "board game" meant Monopoly or Risk. Then several brave souls dared to ask the question: "What if this was fun?" Thirty years later, we're blessed with tabletop games that challenge our minds, immerse us in other worlds and conjure good times with those we love — sometimes all three at once. For your gift-buying needs, we've put together a list of new favorites and returning classics that run the gamuts of genre and weight. If you're ready to push beyond Pictionary, read on. Best board games to gift (and play) this holiday season
Check out the re...

item.title: NASA’s MAVEN Spacecraft May Actually Be Lost in Space
item.description: This could be the end of the orbiter that studies the Red Planet’s atmosphere and relays communications between NASA and its Mars rovers.

item.title: Instagram launches a Fire TV app for Reels
item.description: Have you ever just wished you could watch Instagram Reels right on a TV? Maybe? Well, if so, you're in luck. Meta has launched an Instagram app exclusively on Fire TV. It will be solely for "short-form video content," so Reels. TikTok launched an app on Fire TV in 2020 before rolling it out to other platforms. Instagram and Fire TV users can download the former through Amazon's App Store. It can either link to an existing account or have a separate account just for TV. The app can hold up to five different Instagram accounts — and time spent factors into any limits on teen accounts. "Our mis...

item.title: Instagram is putting Reels on your TV
item.description: Meta is starting to test a new Instagram app for TVs that lets you watch Reels on a big screen. The app will be available first as a pilot for Amazon Fire TV devices in the US starting Tuesday. The homescreen of the Reels-focused app will show personalized, horizontal collections of videos to browse through. […]

item.title: My Favorite Murder and The Breakfast Club podcasts are ditching YouTube for Netflix
item.description: Netflix is plowing ahead with plans to build out a library of video podcasts as it aims to keep viewers locked into the service even when they may not be watching what's on their screens. On Tuesday, Netflix announced that it's teaming up with radio giant iHeartMedia to add more than 15 video podcasts to […]

item.title: Instagram brings Reels to the big screen, starting with Amazon Fire TV
item.description: By bringing Reels to TVs, Instagram can better compete with YouTube, which largely dominates the TV space.

item.title: How to watch Cardiff vs Chelsea: live stream Carabao Cup 2025/26 quarter-final, TV channels, preview
item.description: The Cardiff vs Chelsea live stream will decipher who reaches the Carabao Cup semi-finals. Here's how you can watch from anywhere in the world.

item.title: Redwood Materials just designed a smarter battery recycling bin
item.description: Everyone wants to recycle their batteries, but drop-off locations are hard to find. A new fire-safe bin could make the process easier. If you want to recycle an old electric toothbrush or pair of headphones with a lithium battery embedded inside, it can be hard to find a place to do it—and many existing battery collection boxes are fire risks. That’s why Redwood Materials, the battery recycling and energy storage company founded by ex-Tesla engineer J. B. Straubel, just redesigned the collection bin....

item.title: The Foldable iPhone Might Be ‘Small’
item.description: A new leak claims Apple's book-style foldable iPhone slated for 2026 could be smaller than an iPhone 17 Pro when closed.

item.title: Ubisoft has acquired free-to-play MOBA game March of Giants with Rainbow Six Siege creative director at the helm — 'This game has enormous potential, and I know Ubisoft can help us take it to the next level'
item.description: Ubisoft has today announced that it has acquired the rights to Amazon's free-to-play multiplayer online battle arena (MOBA), March of Giants.

item.title: Avant Clair Obscur, il y avait ce GOTY et il est à son plus bas prix pour ce Noël 2025 sur Amazon
item.description: Astro Bot est le Game of the Year qui a précédé Clair Obscur Expedition 33, donc en 2024. Il est possible de le commander pour 41,12 euros au lieu de 69,99 euros sur Amazon.

item.title: Le navigateur dopé à l’IA Opera Neon est disponible en version test, à une condition
item.description: Plus besoin d'invitation pour tester Opera Neon, le navigateur agentique qui veut révolutionner Internet. Mais tout le monde ne se jettera pas dessus.

item.title: Apple TV adds support for Google Cast even as Netflix ditches the feature
item.description: The tech giant's adoption of Google Cast signals its interest in making Apple TV a more competitive streaming service at a time when the market is seeing increased consolidation.

item.title: Cette marque a dégommé notre Top 5 des smartphones à la plus grosse autonomie, et elle risque de recommencer en 2026
item.description: Après avoir régné presque un an sur notre classement d’autonomie, le OnePlus 13 a été dépassé par le OnePlus 15. Mais la firme chinoise prépare déjà son prochain champion, baptisé OnePlus Turbo, promis comme un monstre d’endurance. Avec une batterie de 9000 mAh — soit 23 % de plus que celle du OnePlus 15 — le constructeur chinois semble bien décidé à repousser encore les limites de la technologie silicium carbone....

item.title: As RAM panic grips the PC-building community, I'm putting my feet up and relaxing - here's why
item.description: Yes, RAM prices are terrible right now - but as a veteran PC-builder, I'm not that concerned.

item.title: Hacking group says it’s extorting Pornhub after stealing users’ viewing data
item.description: The Scattered Lapsus$ Hunters hacking collective stole Pornhub premium users’ data, including email addresses and viewing history.

item.title: Amazon is set to lay off 370 workers at its European HQ
item.description: Amazon is set to fire 370 people at its European headquarters in Luxembourg in the coming weeks, as Bloomberg reports. That accounts for about 8.5 percent of the workforce. Amazon initially planned to reduce its headcount there by 470, but under European Union law, companies have to negotiate layoffs with employee reps and, in some cases, governments.Amazon reportedly told employees at the European HQ in a memo the layoffs are "adjustments that reflect business needs and local strategies." The company claims to be going "well beyond industry benchmarks" in Luxembourg with regards to the severa...

item.title: Texas is suing all of the big TV makers for spying on what you watch
item.description: Texas is suing five of the biggest TV makers, accusing them of "secretly recording what consumers watch in their own homes." In separate lawsuits filed on Tuesday, Texas Attorney General Ken Paxton claims the TVs made by Sony, Samsung, LG, Hisense, and TCL are part of a "mass surveillance system" that uses Automatic Content Recognition […]

item.title: Trump White House says ballroom construction must continue for national security reasons
item.description: The administration cited the reason in a court filing responding to a lawsuit by the National Trust for Historic Preservation. The Trump administration said in a court filing Monday that the president’s White House ballroom construction project must continue for unexplained national security reasons and because a preservationists’ organization that wants it stopped has no standing to sue.The filing was in response to a lawsuit filed last Friday by the National Trust for Historic Preservation asking a federal judge to halt President Donald Trump’s project until it goes through multiple independ...

item.title: The ChatGPT app just got a big upgrade on iOS and Android to stop your chats spiraling out of control
item.description: iPhone and Android users just got access to this excellent ChatGPT feature, albeit three months late.

item.title: Eggs recalled after Salmonella sickens 63 people in California: See the list of products and stores impacted
item.description: The California outbreak, linked to Vega Farms eggs, follows a wave Salmonella outbreaks linked to eggs this year. Here’s the latest. Vega Farms, a California-based food producer, has voluntarily recalled Vega Farms-branded in-shell eggs due to a Salmonella outbreak that has sickened more than 60 people and led to more than a dozen hospitalizations. ...

item.title: The power and potential of agentic AI in cybersecurity
item.description: Why it will become essential for organizations to have dedicated security measures for agentic AI-based tools.

item.title: Did novelty camera maker Lomography just get serious? I held the MC-A — and it’s finally a proper 35mm film camera
item.description: Lomography unveiled the Lomo MC-A in October 2025 — it's a proper 35mm film camera with glass 35mm f/2.8 lens, metal body, autofocus and exposure control.
